18
19#ifndef _DIGEST_H
20#define _DIGEST_H
21
22/* Maximum digest output length */
23#define SSH_DIGEST_MAX_LENGTH 64
24
25/* Digest algorithms */
26#define SSH_DIGEST_MD5 0
27#define SSH_DIGEST_SHA1 1
28#define SSH_DIGEST_SHA256 2
29#define SSH_DIGEST_SHA384 3
30#define SSH_DIGEST_SHA512 4
31#define SSH_DIGEST_MAX 5
32
33struct sshbuf;
34struct ssh_digest_ctx;
35
36/* Looks up a digest algorithm by name */
37int ssh_digest_alg_by_name(const char *name);
38
39/* Returns the algorithm name for a digest identifier */
40const char *ssh_digest_alg_name(int alg);
41
42/* Returns the algorithm's digest length in bytes or 0 for invalid algorithm */
43size_t ssh_digest_bytes(int alg);
44
45/* Returns the block size of the digest, e.g. for implementing HMAC */
46size_t ssh_digest_blocksize(struct ssh_digest_ctx *ctx);
47
48/* Copies internal state of digest of 'from' to 'to' */
49int ssh_digest_copy_state(struct ssh_digest_ctx *from,
50 struct ssh_digest_ctx *to);
51
52/* One-shot API */
53int ssh_digest_memory(int alg, const void *m, size_t mlen,
54 u_char *d, size_t dlen)
55 __attribute__((__bounded__(__buffer__, 2, 3)))
56 __attribute__((__bounded__(__buffer__, 4, 5)));
57int ssh_digest_buffer(int alg, const struct sshbuf *b, u_char *d, size_t dlen)
58 __attribute__((__bounded__(__buffer__, 3, 4)));
59
60/* Update API */
61struct ssh_digest_ctx *ssh_digest_start(int alg);
62int ssh_digest_update(struct ssh_digest_ctx *ctx, const void *m, size_t mlen)
63 __attribute__((__bounded__(__buffer__, 2, 3)));
64int ssh_digest_update_buffer(struct ssh_digest_ctx *ctx,
65 const struct sshbuf *b);
66int ssh_digest_final(struct ssh_digest_ctx *ctx, u_char *d, size_t dlen)
67 __attribute__((__bounded__(__buffer__, 2, 3)));
68void ssh_digest_free(struct ssh_digest_ctx *ctx);
69
70#endif /* _DIGEST_H */
71
72
